info.title: News Summarizer
info.description: Extract quick highlights from news articles using state of the art text summarizer.
info.x-long-description:
Get abstractive and extractive summaries of news articles using a state of the art deep neural network based AI model.
Most summarizers simply provide the first 2-3 lines as the summary of a news article. This can be limiting in many cases. Our model is specifically trained to extract key sentences and abstract out longer sentences and condense them into a crisp summary.
Our summarizer works best for articles in English, but we encourage you to try other languages too. Please reach out to us on services@idealmix.in if you have any queries or want to seek a custom quote.

post.description:
Get abstractive and extractive summaries of news articles by providing the raw text of the article or a web URL of the article.

Parameters:
`input_link`: URL of the article.
`input_text`: Raw text of the article.

Use one of the above two parameters. If both are provided, only `input_text` will be picked.

Guidance:
It is advised to use `input_text` parameter as opposed to `input_link` if all your articles come from a small set of source websites. In such a case, you can write a parser for your articles which is custom-tailored to the structure of your articles and hence no extra phrases are captured during the parsing of the text.

value.summary: Andy Murray beat Dominic Thiem 3-6 6-4, 6-1 in the Miami Open quarter-finals. The world No 4 will face Tomas Berdych or Juan Monaco in the last four. Murray believes Aljaz Bedene's arrival in the top 100 is a 'positive' thing for British tennis. The 27-year-old believes his fellow British players should use the assimilation of the world number 83, originally from Slovenia, as motivation to better themselves. Murray described Bedene as a 'good player with a very good serve'. The British No 1 is set to marry fiancee Kim Sears next week.
